title: The Little Drummer Boy
description: From the producers of Rudolph the Red-Nosed Reindeer, Frosty the Snowman and Santa Claus Is Comin' to Town! The heartwarming story of Aaron, The Little Drummer Boy, who comes upon the birth of baby Jesus and learns that the best gift is one given from the heart. Share the magic of this Original Christmas ClassicÂ®.
